document.full_text: as meredith vieira confirmed plans  to step down from nbc's 'today' show on june 8, co-anchor matt lauer says he isn't  going anywhere.
document.title: matt lauer staying put at 'today'
lines_and_colors: as meredith vieira confirmed plans  to step down from nbc's 'today' show on june 8, co-anchor matt lauer says he isn't  going anywhere.
